content: Sept 11 Whirlpool Corp said it was withdrawing its proposal to buy Britain's AGA Rangemaster Group Plc  whose shareholders approved a $201 million takeover offer by U.S. cooking equipment maker Middleby Corp on Tuesday.
name: The Middleby Corporation
title: Whirlpool to withdraw offer for Britain's AGA Rangemaster

title: U.S. firm Middleby buys renowned British cooker maker Aga
